description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Explore the microscopic world of the amoeba with 7 unique stages including the Virus, Atomic, Defensive, Colonial and more. Control your amoeba and go from one microscopic organism to a intellectual amoeba able to control hundreds of amoebas
